title: SHOW commands: Update OWNER column for objects owned by Snowflake | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_01 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The behavior of the owner column is as follows:
The owner column does not return a value for the following commands:
SHOW APPLICATION ROLES IN APPLICATION SNOWFLAKE
The owner column returns a value for the following commands as follows:
SHOW APPLICATION ROLE IN APPLICATION SNOWFLAKE
SNOWFLAKE for the schema named LOCAL.
This output applies to both commands.

Disabling the 2024_01 behavior change bundle does not
disable the changes described in this topic.
